name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Waves - Chat with new people while web surfing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet and talk with those who are on the same website at the same moment!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Waves and make conversations with the other visitors of any website.
Waves help you find and let you chat with others while you discover the World Wide Web.

There are organically emerged communities around every website,
now you can finally get to know your hidden comrades and companions
– chat with new people wherever you roam on the net.
On every new site you visit, it’s like you are landing on a different planet,
you may meet new tribes, and you can get to know the ecosystem of those who are there. The discovery of the Web is just beginning! Get on Waves!

Latest functions:
*Group chat on every page on the whole Web
*Recommend the most active Wikimedia pages with titled links
*Search all Wikimedia pages and show how many online users there are
*Choose a color for your name
*Blocking profiles and managing blocklist
*Censorship on and off
*Feedback


(Waves is a free project to extend the possibilities of the internet and beyond.)
